title: "The Darkness Grows" mission not working?
body: The mission requirement is to get the last hit on 3 wards(Which I have) and then place 3 control wards. The control wards portion of the quest is not completing. I specifically did the requirement on 2 matches and none of the control wards triggered it. Am I missing something?

replies.body: You must place a control ward in 3 separate games. They didn't write it quite right in the Mission in the game but that's what it says on the online list.
I was able to complete the 3 control wards portion by just placing 3 control wards in a row in a Co-Op vs AI game.
Hmm. Could be it's just glitched then, cause mine I had to do it in multiple games.
